mapper.select: SELECT log_id, city_ip, city_id, city_name, browser, portal, device, page_name, operation_name, operation_result, operation_type, memo, customer_id FROM shangshufang_log.business_analyse_log ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shangshufang_log.business_analyse_log ( city_ip, city_id, city_name, browser, portal, device, page_name, operation_name, operation_result, operation_type, memo, customer_id ) VALUES ( #{cityIP, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{browser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portal, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{device, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationResult, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerID, jdbcType=INTEGER} );
